title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
SR:
The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database with the following details:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6. [Additional details or instructions needed to observe the behavior].
